AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bagel baker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] owned a semi-successful bakery that sold a variety of bagels, along with a few bread products. After noticing an alarming amount of spiders stealing from the shelves, [PAWN_nameDef] spent weeks ushering them out before negotiating a deal with them. Somehow, this deal boosted the popularity of [PAWN_nameDef]'s bakery, and all was good until a health inspector shut things down.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fur stylist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] roamed between towns as a fur stylist. [PAWN_possessive] expertise is trimming, gelling, coloring fur, and gathering up as much gossip as possible. As the need for barbers diminished, it became more difficult to find work for [PAWN_nameDef]. Nevertheless, with keen fingers and sharp scissors, [PAWN_pronoun] clung to the hope of finding work, preferably work that wasn't bloody.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Oval optometrist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has dealt with eyes for as long as [PAWN_pronoun] can remember. Not only does [PAWN_pronoun] examine the eyes of patients and prescribes eye care medication, [PAWN_nameDef] also meticulously crafts the glasses for them in [PAWN_possessive] clinic. For some reason, [PAWN_pronoun] has a fascination with round colorful glasses. From small oval blue-rimmed to large circular green-rimmed, [PAWN_nameDef] often gets lost in [PAWN_pronoun] own craftsmanship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Reluctant recruit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Kidnapped and forced to train in an outlander army, [PAWN_nameDef] had to learn the basics of combat (with a side of first aid practice) at the risk of undergoing punishment. Thankfully, [PAWN_pronoun] never had to harm anything in training and eventually escaped the outlanders, though [PAWN_pronoun] regrettably retains knowledge of combat and weaponry.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Castle mason
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Need a castle built in a day? The construction company [PAWN_nameDef] worked for can't promise that, but you'll get a quality fortress for sure. [PAWN_nameDef] spent countless hours laying bricks, rocks, and cement in a precise fashion, and [PAWN_pronoun] can't think of doing anything better.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Blind veterinarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] became a novice at caring for animals at a young age, and decided to specialize in caring for blind pets. After deciding to adopt blind strays [PAWN_pronoun]'d find over the years, [PAWN_nameDef] ran out of time to cook for [PAWN_objective]self and resorted to buying takeout and fast food.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Spice merchant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: If you want to set your tongue ablaze, [PAWN_nameDef] is the Dreemurr you want. Travelling between kingdoms and cities, [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for bartering and sold customers on spice health benefits. Just go easy on [PAWN_possessive] assortment of capsaicin - [PAWN_pronoun] tends to carry the spiciest of spicy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Selfless medium
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Being heavily into the occult, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to learn spirit channeling and made it a business. [PAWN_pronoun] would set up a stand in the park of [PAWN_possessive] home city and charge a reasonable price for a seance. Problem is, more often than not, [PAWN_nameDef] wouldn't get any connection from the land of the dead. Of course, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't have the heart to lie, so [PAWN_pronoun]'d always give the customer a refund.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Commercial demonstrator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Appearing in various product commercials, [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was demonstrating how to use the featured product. A bulk of [PAWN_possessive] jobs called for use of kitchen appliances, such as knives, blenders, no-stick pans, the list goes on. Because these commercials aired in a fairly small town, [PAWN_nameDef] became somewhat of a local celebrity.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Washed-up millionaire
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made wise financial decisions at an early age, leading to [PAWN_possessive] status of millionaire before [PAWN_pronoun] was legally able to drink. After a few deals gone sour and a lot of mistakes, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_objective]self in crippling debt. [PAWN_pronoun] changed his face and began his new life off-the-grid.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cryptozoologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] believes that mythical creatures and entities are real, and [PAWN_possessive] one goal in life is to discover and catalogue them all. [PAWN_pronoun] never really found any true evidence of these creatures, but [PAWN_pronoun] is adamant that a hair (matching [PAWN_possessive] fur color) came from one of these elusive monsters.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Librarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Working full-time at [PAWN_possessive] local library, [PAWN_nameDef] really enjoyed the peace and quiet. In between checking people out and calling people to return their incredibly-overdue books, [PAWN_pronoun] tried reading every book in the library. [PAWN_pronoun] was particularly interested in botany and culinary arts.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Candle crafter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loves everything about candles. From the scent, colors, and creation process. [PAWN_pronoun] sold some of the candles online and made a steady income from it, though some people complained of fur being in the wax.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Advertising mastermind
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent eight years in college to obtain a bachelor's degree in marketing and advertising. [PAWN_pronoun] was a big shot in the industry, and was a billionaire by the end of [PAWN_possessive] first year. One day, [PAWN_pronoun] decided [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't happy with [PAWN_objective]self and left the scene, never to return.
